title: Instructional Design Workshop for English Curriculum Reform and Teacher Awareness Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Intensive workshop conducted in a smartphone-centered restricted technology environment. Applying qualitative research methodology using semi-structured interviews to analyze teachers' perceptions and derive curriculum improvement strategies

learning_goals: Can analyze the impact of curriculum reform on teachers' perceptions using qualitative research methods
Can propose a systematic research design to collect changes in teachers' perceptions using semi-structured interview techniques
Can derive three actionable instructional strategies for curriculum improvement

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
